sentences.en: a well-known entertainer on the club circuit
sentences.cn: 到夜总会作巡回表演的一位著名艺人

sentences.en: At Christmas the visitors began their circuit of dropping in on the eve of the feast day.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节时，客人们在节日前夜开始逐家拜节。

sentences.en: Carbon dust and oil build up in large motors and cause them to short-circuit.
sentences.cn: 碳尘和燃油在大发动机里越积越多，造成了发动机短路。

sentences.en: He was just starting to become known on the cabaret circuit.
sentences.cn: 他在卡巴莱歌舞表演圈中刚刚开始有点名气。

sentences.en: I do circuit training once a week.
sentences.cn: 我每周做一次循环训练。

sentences.en: It was an easy opening circuit, but the riders attacked it with a will.
sentences.cn: 这一段起始赛道十分平缓，但车手们都铆足了劲往前冲。

sentences.en: It's a common problem, the one I'm asked about most when I'm on the lecture circuit.
sentences.cn: 这问题很常见,我在巡回讲演时被问得最多的就是这个问题.

sentences.en: Mary was able to short-circuit her stress response by keeping her thoughts calm and rational.
sentences.cn: 玛丽能够保持头脑清醒理智，因而迅速做出反应。

sentences.en: The approach was intended to short-circuit normal complaints procedures.
sentences.cn: 这种方法旨在避开正常的投诉程序。

sentences.en: The fire was started by an electrical short-circuit.
sentences.cn: 火灾是由电线短路引发的。

sentences.en: The race ended with eight laps of a city centre circuit.
sentences.cn: 比赛以环绕城中心跑八圈结束。

sentences.en: The two cars finished up in a run-off area, clear of the circuit, and that was a mercy.
sentences.cn: 两辆车最后都停在了缓冲区，避开了赛车道，真是万幸。

sentences.en: There is an internal circuit breaker to protect the instrument from overload.
sentences.cn: 内置有断路器，防止设备过载。

sentences.en: We did a circuit of the old city.
sentences.cn: 我们绕着老城走了一圈。

sentences.en: We made the circuit of the old city walls.
sentences.cn: 我们绕着旧城墙转了一圈.

sentences.en: Where does this line tie in with the main circuit?
sentences.cn: 这条线在哪里跟主线路连接在一起 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 迂曲的；绕行的；迂回线路的
电路；电路系统；电路学；一环路

trans.tran_cn: 电路，巡回（赛），赛车道，环行（路线）
trans.tran_en: a path that forms a circle around an area, or a journey along this path
